@ Otakucat, amy, and others - use dosbox, an old dos emulator on modern machines, complete with on-the-fly manageable cpu speeds and other happy features...
Am i the ONLY one who doesn't have sound?

Hello! Works well for me except that I do not have any sound. Not a big deal, though, since this game does not have a lot to offer in that department anyway. But I only have 1 empty save-slot, slot 7. When I try to save over one of the other slots it gives me some kind of errormessage. How can I fix this? Thanks.
